articles.title: Prince Harry says he visited the Queen to ensure she was ‘protected’ - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Harry has raised hackles in the UK by telling American television show Today that he wanted to make sure his grandmother ‘had the right people around her’.

articles.description: MULTIMEDIA | The Covid-19 pandemic has indelibly touched every American. We review the last two years in words, images, and data.

articles.title: Earth's message to space 'more ceremonial than anything' - NT News
articles.description:
ANU astrophysicist and cosmologist Dr Brad Tucker says the chances aliens will listen to and decode a radio message to the stars is “slim at best”.  

In 1974, American scientists sent the Arecibo message to space, saying there is life on earth. Now, the mess…
